quote: Wisdom is the oneness of mind that guides and permeated all things.
author: Heraclitus,  Fragments

quote: Wisdom. . .is knowing what you have to accept.
author: Wallace Stegner,  Angle of Repose

quote: Wisdom is the daughter of experience
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Wisdom is having things right in your lifeand knowing why.
author: William Stafford

quote: Wisdom comes alone through suffering.
author: Aeschylus

quote: The greatest wisdom consists in knowing one's own follies.
author: Madeleine De Souvre Sable

quote: Wisdom.... comes not from age, but from education and learning.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: There is a wisdom of the head, and... there is a wisdom of the heart.
author: Charles Dickens,  Hard Times

quote: Wisdom is knowing what to do next; Skill is knowing how to do it, and Virtue is doing it.
author: David Starr Jordan

quote: wisdom comes to us when it can no longer do any good.
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Love in the Time of Cholera

quote: We don't receive wisdom; we must discover it for ourselves after a journey that no one can take for us or spare us.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: The essence of wisdom is to know when to be doing, and when it's useless even to try
author: Mary Stewart,  The Last Enchantment

quote: Wisdom is indispensable in the fulfillment of purpose".
author: Osiri Wisdom

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Wisdom comes through suffering.Trouble, with its memories of pain,Drips in our hearts as we try to sleep,So men against their willLearn to practice moderation.Favours come to us from gods.
author: Aeschylus,  Agamemnon

quote: True wisdom consists in two things: Knowledge of God and Knowledge of Self.
author: John Calvin

quote: Wisdom is one of the few things that looks bigger the further away it is.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Witches Abroad

quote: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
author: Buddha

quote: Wisdom equals knowledge plus courage. You have to not only know what to do and when to do it, but you have to also be brave enough to follow through.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
author: Socrates

quote: Wisdom ain't a virtue I ever aspired to.
author: Moira Young,  Blood Red Road

quote: Perhaps wisdom is simply a matter of waiting, and healing a question of time. And anything good you've ever been given is yours forever.
author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quote: Wisdom is the reward for surviving our own stupidity.
author: Brian Rathbone,  Regent

quote: WisdomWhen I have ceased to break my wings Against the faultiness of things, And learned that compromises wait Behind each hardly opened gate, When I can look Life in the eyes, Grown calm and very coldly wise, Life will have given me the Truth, And taken in exchange -- my youth.
author: Sara Teasdale,  Love Songs

quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Wisdom is seeing something in a non-habitual manner.
author: William James

quote: Stand in the divine rain, and seeds of wisdom will grow in your soul.
author: Peter Kreeft

quote: Wisdom comes from education and experience—not from age.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Knowledge is marvelous, but wisdom is even better.
author: Kay Redfield Jamison

quote: Those who possess wisdom cannot just ladle it out to every wantwit and jackanapes who comes along and asks for it. A person must be prepared to receive wisdom, or else it will do him more harm than good. Moreover, a lout thrashing about in the clear waters of wisdom will dirty those waters for everyone else.
author: Tom Robbins,  Jitterbug Perfume

quote: Wisdom is knowing I am nothing,Love is knowing I am everything,and between the two my life moves.
author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

quote: Wisdom is knowledge plus courage. You not only have to know what to do and when—but you have to be brave enough to actually act on it.
author: Jarod Kintz,  So many chairs, and no time to sit

quote: The beauty of collaboration between older and younger generations is that we combine strength with wisdom—a surefire way to accomplish more for the glory of God.
author: Brett Harris

quote: Keep me away from the wisdom which does not cry, the philosophy which does not laugh and the greatness which does not bow before children.
author: Kahlil Gibran,  Mirrors of the Soul

quote: Wisdom is knowing when you are being patient, and when you are wasting time by waiting.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: One way to define wisdom is the ability to see, into the future, the consequences of your choices in the present. That ability can give you a completely different perspective on what the future might look like.
author: Andy Andrews,  The Noticer: Sometimes, All a Person Needs Is a Little Perspective

quote: What comes from experience is knowledge,what comes naturally is wisdom.
author: NITYA MORE

quote: To be evenminded is the greatest virtue.Wisdom is to speakthe truth and actin keeping with its nature.
author: Heraclitus,  Fragments

quote: All our wisdom is stored in the trees.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: To pursue wisdom is to live in such a way that one is prepared to face death when it comes. (247)
author: Gregory Bassham,  The Ultimate Harry Potter and Philosophy: Hogwarts for Muggles

quote: Ignorance is darkness. Knowledge is light. Wisdom is awaken spirit
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The most certain sign of wisdom is cheerfulness.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The beginning of wisdom is the definition of terms.
author: Socrates

quote: Wisdom is worth more than gold.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Spirituality is recognizing and celebrating that we are all inextricably connected to each other by a power greater than all of us, and that our connection to that power and to one another is grounded in love and compassion. Practicing spirituality brings a sense of perspective, meaning and purpose to our lives.
author: Brené Brown,  The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are

quote: Our wisdom comes from our experience,and our experience comes from our foolishness.
author: Sacha Guitry

quote: Wisdom comes from experience. Experience is often a result of lack of wisdom.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
author: Baltasar Gracián

quote: In life, all good things come hard, but wisdom is the hardest to come by.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Don't Gain The World & Lose Your Soul, Wisdom Is Better Than Silver Or Gold.
author: Bob Marley
